title: Does Viral Video Show Voter Fraud in Atlanta, Georgia?
subtitle: According to the Fulton County elections director, a poll worker allegedly seen discarding a ballot in the video has had to go into hiding because of threats of violence.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A widely shared video of a vote-count worker in Atlanta, Georgia, is definitive proof of electoral fraud in the aftermath of the 2020 U.S. presidential election.
